name: Establishes Coherence Theorems
description: Establishes fundamental mathematical theorems that determine the properties, guarantees, and constraints of coherence-preserving dynamical systems.
subject: urn:uor:resource:coherence-preserving-dynamics
contextualDescription: The Coherence-Preserving Dynamics resource establishes four key theorems that govern coherence-preserving systems: the Coherence Preservation Theorem, Coherence Convergence Theorem, Coherence Conservation Theorem, and Coherence Fluctuation Theorem, providing a mathematical foundation for analyzing such systems.
